original_text: “However, the Most High does not live in houses made by human hands. As the prophet says:
korean_text: 그러나 지극히 높으신 이는 손으로 지은 곳에 계시지 아니하시나니 선지자가 말한 바

sentences.original_text: However, the Most High does not live
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 가장 높으신 분은 거하지 않으신다

sentences.original_text: in houses made by human hands
